item.description: Photo: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg via Getty Images As of March 2023, EA employed 13,400 people Electronic Arts is laying off 5% of its workforce, or around 670 of the company‚Äôs workers. EA employed...
item.content:encoded: Photo: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg via Getty Images As of March 2023, EA employed 13,400 people Electronic Arts is laying off 5% of its workforce, or around 670 of the company‚Äôs workers. EA employed around 13,400 people by the end of last March, according to a regulatory filing. Sixty-five percent of those employees are located outside the U.S., it said at the time. Notifying impacted employees ‚Äúhas already begun and will be largely completed by early next quarter,‚Äù EA CEO Andrew Wilson wrote ...

item.content:encoded: Photo: Cameron Faulkner/Polygon This $20 accessory lets you use other wireless controllers with almost no downsides For some people, the best controller to use with a Nintendo Switch is the company‚Äôs own Switch Pro controller. It has unbeatable battery life sailing beyond 40 hours per charge, and it‚Äôs comfortable to use. Personally? I love it. The worst thing about it? It costs $69.99, more than the cost of most new Switch games. Plus, it doesn‚Äôt have as many cool features as Sony‚Äôs DualSense ...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: William Joel/Polygon | Source images: 8Bitdo, Anker Our favorite accessories for every kind of Steam Deck Valve‚Äôs Steam Deck is a powerful handheld PC that can run many games from the vast catalog of Steam games, and it has a stellar accessory scene. Rather than replay Final Fantasy 7 Remake and the original FF7 in their entirety, we strongly recommend pulling an ‚Äúoh damn, the big test is tomorrow‚Äù cram session. A trio of YouTubers have produced the modern equivalent of CliffsNotes in the form of entertaining and educational video summaries. Because I respect your time, I have limited the recommendation...

item.content:encoded: Image: Arrowhead Game Studios/Sony Interactive Entertainment via Polygon The tutorial does a lot of heavy lifting They say brevity is the soul of wit, and Arrowhead Game Studios has demonstrated that wonderfully with the opening of Helldivers 2. There are two philosophies at the core of the game‚Äôs narrative: the first is that war is hell, and the second is that the authorities will lie to you about war being hell so that you‚Äôre more willing to sign up. Instead of belaboring the point over mult...

The right tools could help researchers analyze these videos, transforming how we understand the world around us. Videos offer dynamic visual content far more r...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Zheng Xu, Research Scientist, and Yanxiang Zhang, Software Engineer, Google Language models (LMs) trained to predict the next word given input text are the key technology for many applications [1, 2]. In Gboard, LMs are used to improve users‚Äô typing experience by supporting features like next word prediction (NWP), Smart Compose, smart completion and suggestion, slide to type, and proofread. Deploying models on users‚Äô devices rather than enterprise servers has advantages like lower...

item.title: Prompt Engineering: An Integrated Dream | KDnuggets
item.description: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just ano...
item.content:encoded: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just another internet pipe dream? Let's ditch the sensationalism and delve into the actual job market data to find out.

item.title: Introduction to Memory Profiling in Python | KDnuggets
